meanings.sent1: Don't be an airhead and forget your keys again!
meanings.sent2: She always acts like an airhead in math class.
meanings.sent3: The airhead thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: His boss called him an airhead for forgetting the important meeting.
meanings.sent5: Being an airhead can lead to silly mistakes.

meanings.definition: A person who is not very intelligent or interested in serious matters.
meanings.sent1: The airhead didn't understand the complex science experiment.
meanings.sent2: He's such an airhead when it comes to politics.
meanings.sent3: The airhead thought the earth was flat!
meanings.sent4: She's an airhead when it comes to technology.
meanings.sent5: Being an airhead can make you miss out on important information.

meanings.definition: A person who is not very serious or thoughtful.
meanings.sent1: Stop being an airhead and pay attention to the lecture.
meanings.sent2: She's always seen as an airhead because she jokes around too much.
meanings.sent3: The airhead wore mismatched socks to the formal event.
meanings.sent4: He's an airhead when it comes to following instructions.
meanings.sent5: Being an airhead can sometimes be seen as carefree.
